_meanings:
{@--2@} An outer tent, screen of
cloth.

{@--3@} A kind of magical veil
(or spell) rendering the wearer 
invisible; <ls>Åš. 6.</ls> and <ls>V. 2</ls>, {%inter alia%}.
It is properly the science or art 
possessed by celestial beings of 
rendering themselves invisible by 
repeating some {%Mantras%}.
